evidence.claim: YGEIA Group utilizes AWS for cloud services and infrastructure management.
The company adheres to HIPAA standards to ensure patient data confidentiality.
YGEIA Group implements FHIR standards in their healthcare data integration solutions.
X12 transactions are supported in their EDI capabilities for insurance claims processing.
HL7 compliance is part of their health data management solutions.

icp.icp_reason: YGEIA Group engages in healthcare data interoperability and mentions X12 transactions.
